The last price of Elmoreden, he took the demonic powers,
fled and was sealed in the Last Imperial Tomb.
To join the Frintezza raid, you must be in a party or
command channel of 2 to 100 people of Lv. 80+.
The raid last for 30 min., and every Wednesday there
is a reset, so you can take part int this battle
once a week per account.
